syncId.description:
Unique identifier for the created synchronization operation.
This ID can be used with other SyncService RPCs to monitor and manage the sync.

v1alpha2CreateSyncResponse.description: CreateSyncResponse contains the result of creating a new synchronization operation.

id.description: Unique identifier of the synchronization operation.

status.description: Current status of the synchronization operation.

remoteDirectory.description: URL of the remote Directory node being synchronized from.

createdTime.title:
Timestamp when the synchronization operation was created in the RFC3339 format.
Specs: https://www.rfc-editor.org/rfc/rfc3339.html

lastUpdateTime.description: Timestamp of the most recent status update for this synchronization in the RFC3339 format.

v1alpha2GetSyncResponse.description: GetSyncResponse provides detailed information about a specific synchronization operation.

syncId.description: Unique identifier of the synchronization operation.

remoteDirectory.description: URL of the remote Directory being synchronized from.

v1alpha2ListSyncItem.description: ListSyncItem represents a single synchronization in the list of all syncs.

v1alpha2SyncStatus.description:
SyncStatus enumeration defines the possible states of a synchronization operation.

 - SYNC_STATUS_UNSPECIFIED: Default/unset status - should not be used in practice
 - SYNC_STATUS_PENDING: Sync operation has been created but not yet started
 - SYNC_STATUS_IN_PROGRESS: Sync operation is actively discovering and transferring objects
 - SYNC_STATUS_COMPLETED: Sync operation completed successfully with all objects transferred
 - SYNC_STATUS_FAILED: Sync operation encountered an error and stopped
